check-keymaps.sh   check-keymaps.sh 
#!/bin/bash #!/bin/bash
# check that all key names in keymaps/* are known in <linux/input.h> # check that all key names in keymaps/* are known in <linux/input.h>
# and that all key maps listed in the rules are valid and present in # and that all key maps listed in the rules are valid and present in
# Makefile.am # Makefile.am
SRCDIR=${1:-.} SRCDIR=${1:-.}
KEYLIST=${2:-extras/keymap/keys.txt} KEYLIST=${2:-src/extras/keymap/keys.txt}
KEYMAPS_DIR=$SRCDIR/extras/keymap/keymaps #extras/keymap/keymaps KEYMAPS_DIR=$SRCDIR/src/extras/keymap/keymaps
RULES=$SRCDIR/extras/keymap/95-keymap.rules RULES=$SRCDIR/src/extras/keymap/95-keymap.rules
[ -e "$KEYLIST" ] || { [ -e "$KEYLIST" ] || {
echo "need $KEYLIST please build first" >&2 echo "need $KEYLIST please build first" >&2
exit 1 exit 1
} }
missing=$(join -v 2 <(awk '{print tolower(substr($1,5))}' $KEYLIST | sort - u) \ missing=$(join -v 2 <(awk '{print tolower(substr($1,5))}' $KEYLIST | sort - u) \
<(grep -hv '^#' ${KEYMAPS_DIR}/*| awk '{print $2}' | so rt -u)) <(grep -hv '^#' ${KEYMAPS_DIR}/*| awk '{print $2}' | so rt -u))
[ -z "$missing" ] || { [ -z "$missing" ] || {
echo "ERROR: unknown key names in extras/keymap/keymaps/*:" >&2 echo "ERROR: unknown key names in src/extras/keymap/keymaps/*:" >&2
echo "$missing" >&2 echo "$missing" >&2
exit 1 exit 1
} }
# check that all maps referred to in $RULES exist # check that all maps referred to in $RULES exist
maps=$(sed -rn '/keymap \$name/ { s/^.*\$name ([^"[:space:]]+).*$/\1/; p }' $RULES) maps=$(sed -rn '/keymap \$name/ { s/^.*\$name ([^"[:space:]]+).*$/\1/; p }' $RULES)
for m in $maps; do for m in $maps; do
# ignore inline mappings # ignore inline mappings
[ "$m" = "${m#0x}" ] || continue [ "$m" = "${m#0x}" ] || continue
[ -e ${KEYMAPS_DIR}/$m ] || { [ -e ${KEYMAPS_DIR}/$m ] || {
echo "ERROR: unknown map name in $RULES: $m" >&2 echo "ERROR: unknown map name in $RULES: $m" >&2
exit 1 exit 1
} }
grep -q "extras/keymap/keymaps/$m\>" $SRCDIR/Makefile.am || { grep -q "src/extras/keymap/keymaps/$m\>" $SRCDIR/Makefile.am || {
echo "ERROR: map file $m is not added to Makefile.am" >&2 echo "ERROR: map file $m is not added to Makefile.am" >&2
exit 1 exit 1
} }
done done
